descriptor.long_desc: The Philips Mixer Grinder is a versatile kitchen appliance designed to simplify your cooking tasks. Equipped with powerful motors and durable stainless steel blades, it effortlessly grinds, blends, and mixes a variety of ingredients.

descriptor.long_desc: The Philips Air Fryer offers a healthier way to enjoy your favorite fried foods with up to 90% less fat. Using Rapid Air Technology, it circulates hot air to cook food evenly and achieve a crispy texture without the need for excess oil. With its versatile design, you can fry, bake, grill, and roast your meals
